--- value_subquery_select_as_struct.sql
(SELECT AS STRUCT 1 AS i)

--- AST
&ast.ScalarSubQuery{
  Lparen: 0,
  Rparen: 24,
  Query:  &ast.Select{
    Select:   1,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       &ast.AsStruct{
      As:     8,
      Struct: 11,
    },
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 18,
          ValueEnd: 19,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 23,
            NameEnd: 24,
            Name:    "i",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
(SELECT AS STRUCT 1 AS i)
